name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.storageSet
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        text/prompt_key:
          label: Key:
          required@bool: yes
          type: freeform
          default@text:
            some.arbitrary.identifier
          placeholder: (some.arbitrary.identifier)
        text/prompt_value:
          label: Value:
          required@bool: yes
          type: freeform
          default@text:
            This is the saved value.
          placeholder: (an arbitrary value)
        text/prompt_expires:
          label: Expires:
          type: freeform
          default@text: +15 mins
          placeholder: (e.g. +15 mins)
        
  return:
    snippet@text:
      storage.set/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        output: result
        inputs:
          # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/commands/storage.set/
          key: {{prompt_key}}
          value: {{prompt_value}}
          expires: {{prompt_expires}}
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
